name: dinerito-flow
description: DineritoFlow helps you stick to your monthly budget and monitor your spending habits.
author: Rafael De Leon

scripts.migrate:create: cd packages/server && npm prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:deploy: cd packages/server && pnpm prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:status: cd packages/server && pnpm prisma migrate status
scripts.migrate:reset: cd packages/server && pnpm prisma migrate reset
